function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to lack of hygiene and cleanliness standards in hotels.","Impact":"Risk of guests and employees contracting contagious diseases such as Covid-19.","Mitigation":"Implement stringent cleanliness standards and protocols, including frequent disinfection of high-touch areas and use of hospital-grade cleaning materials.","Technologies":"High-efficiency disinfection equipment, contactless technology for check-in/check-out, and UV-C sterilization devices.","People":"Guests, employees, and visitors at hotels.","Owner":"Hotel management and staff, cleaning personnel, and health and safety regulators."}]}
